name: Game Mechanics
text: List of general mechanics introduced by the mod

choices.text: Waypoints and Statue of the Seven
uniques: Comment [Visions users can teleport to waypoints and Statues every 10 turns.]
Comment [Statue of the Seven Full Heals adjacent units.]
Comment [Abyssal factions can corrupt waypoints and Statues of the Seven but can be cleansed by Vision users.]
Comment [Corrupted waypoints and Statues of the Seven can only be used by the abyss.]
Comment [Human units can gain a vision once they reach 100 xp.]
Comment [Units with visions can inflict elemental afflictions and trigger reactions.]
Comment [Different vision types correspond to different elements: Pyro, Hydro, Cryo, Electro, Dendro, Anemo, Geo.]
Comment [Only one vision can be equipped at a time, and visions cannot be changed.]
Comment [Certain units can have elemental attacks and add elemental afflictions to their targets.]
Comment [Elementally infused can both afflict their targets while being completely immune to any attacks from the same element.]
Comment [Killing hilichurls or world bosses with [Human], [Fatui] or [Archon] type units can drop Artifacts for the unit who killed them.]
Comment [Each artifact is part of a 5 piece set that adds passive bonuses at 2,4, or 5 pieces.]
Comment [World bosses drop specific artifact sets related to their element.]
Comment [Units can drop the artifact they have equipped and gain some gold.]
Comment [World bosses only spawn after a certain amount of turns.]
Comment [World bosses drop artifacts and grant a special civ wide unit buff for the nation who defeats it.]
